CollabDocumentMetricRecord.name: CollabDocumentMetricRecord
CollabDocumentMetricRecord.description: Represents an association between a CollabDocumentMetric and a Salesforce record.

ParentRecord.description: The ID of the Salesforce record.

QuipDocumentMetric.description: The ID of the CollabDocumentMetric record.

MetricDate.description: The date that the metric was gathered in your local time zone.

MetricDateOnly.description: The date that the metric was gathered in UTC. Available in API version 55.0 and later.

EntityType.description: The object type of the Salesforce record, such as Account or Contact.
